tasks.title: CI: Enforce shell: bash on POSIX runners
tasks.body: Standardize POSIX steps to use shell: bash across Ubuntu/macOS in all workflows to avoid sh/zed edge cases.

tasks.title: CI: Reduce duplication between build and security-scan jobs
tasks.body: Refactor shared steps (Docker-based Lidarr extraction, CI project scaffolding) into a reusable composite action or a shared action block.

tasks.title: CI: Add fast-fail guard for missing Lidarr assemblies
tasks.body: Before restore/build, verify required assemblies exist under ext/Lidarr-docker/_output/net6.0 and fail with a clear message if missing.

tasks.title: Build: Fix compile error in Constants.cs on CI
tasks.body: Reproduce failure on main/main, repair build break around Constants.cs (line reference from CI). Ensure cross-matrix builds pass.

tasks.title: Repo setup: Add PROJECTS_TOKEN secret and PROJECT_URL variable
tasks.body: Add repo secret PROJECTS_TOKEN (classic PAT with repo, project). Add repo variable PROJECT_URL set to your Project v2 URL (e.g., https://github.com/users/RicherTunes/projects/1).
